name: Sully.ai
long_description:
Our Mission: "One Human, One Doctor".
Why? Because access to a doctor is a basic human right.

Customer: 
Healthcare Organizations

Product: 
All-in-one solution to save doctors time. 

Problem: 
Doctors spend 50% of their time on things other than patient care, and the other 50% is inefficient. 

Solution: 
All-in-one solution for doctors that saves time from pre, post, and during-visit. 

Opportunity: 
Over 1 Billion visits patient care visits occur in the US annually, and the current average cost per visit is $300. When future visits are done by an ASI (Artificial Super Intelligence) doctor at a 10x cheaper cost ($29 per visit), itâ€™s $3.9B in revenue in the US only and $25B+ globally.
